parameters: Father, please give us the strength to annihilate these humans, Thy mistakes of creation.
Press X to change your party members while in battle.
My God, I ask you now to put a hedge of cursing around all my enemies.
Lord, please convict their hearts to stop beating.
I see that the Lord has failed me once again by answering none of my prayers.
Why are humans so weak, anyway? God should have done a better job on them.
Do you want to see how hard I can hit? Because I can hit harder than you.
I don't have time for this. Humans shouldn't even be here!
Are humans always going to be this irritating?
Ugh... This is why I didn't want humans to be created.
Ugh, I hope this goes quickly. I want to get back to my nap.
Press X to change your party members while in battle.
Don't you understand, human? I can see everything about you, all your weaknesses.
It's clear you're no match for us, human. Why don't you give up? We'll see that your body is properly dropped into the void.
I sense that your past is full of trouble, human, and your future holds only heartache.
Are you kitten me right meow? Lucifer woke me up for this?!
I suppose it IS time to sharpen my claws.
... I'm going to nap and come back later.
Look at me! I'm a beautiful human creation.
The chances of me serving humans are...\| not good.
I'm a flawless example of human perfection. Let me fix your face for you.
Your hair is obviously too thick, human. Maybe if we take a little off the top?
Do humans always keep keep playing games they know they're going to lose? Or do they really not understand the odds?
The greatest prize in my unending life will be your death.
Hey, don't worry; I don't want to fight you!
Humans, the race who can marry, raise children, and experience a type of love that I never can.
But at least you can't prevent me from devouring your flesh.
Have you ever wondered what love is? Why would one being feel that way toward another? It's strange, right?
Do you think it's possible to love two beings in the exact same way?
Or is each feeling of love unique, like a living force created out of two people's bond?
It's all right. I still love you.
Do you think you're hurting me? It's nothing compared to the pain in my heart!
Tear my heart out, human. It's already empty while yours is so full. You don't even know what you have.
I could sense your odious presence approaching and couldn't believe my luck! I'll be the one to kill the humans!
Count yourself lucky to have been in the presence of someone as powerful as I before you die, human!
Stop! I won't let you harm the King's creation!
Michael? I thought you would be down longer than... Never mind. We'll take care of you!
You're terrified, aren't you, human? You have no idea what you've stepped into!
The Father is a fool. He'll realize how insignifcant you humans are after I slice you into pieces!
I'll withdraw for now, human, but I'm not done. I have all of time to come back and cut you up.
Do you feel how powerful I am? You should be worshipping me!
Why should I use all of this power to help you? What a waste!
I'll be back, human! And I'll show you what a weak creature you are!
I could sense your odious presence approaching and couldn't believe my luck! I'll be the one to kill the humans!
Stop! I won't let you harm the King's creation!
Michael? I thought you would be down longer than... Never mind. I'll take care of you!
You're terrified, aren't you, human? You have no idea what you've stepped into!
The Father is a fool. He'll realize how insignifcant you humans are after I slice you into pieces!
I'll withdraw for now, human, but I'm not done. I have all of time to come back and cut you up.
Ignorant humans! How can you think of challenging us?
I am going to defeat you so easily!
Press X to change your party members while in battle.
You're not worth serving, human. You're second-made.
Here, human; with that ugly face, you're the one who should be wearing a mask.
\N[3] took 2 Damage from Yadid's thrown mask.
Aw, it broke! Too bad. I thought if you wore it I could stand to keep fighting you.
My wounds mean nothing, human! Does your body heal as well as mine?
You've made a serious error in judgment. Why would God make humans to be so foolish?
God gave us wisdom and gave you humans... what?
I... I don't understand how this is happening! Lucifer said this would be easy!
The human needs to learn to hit harder. Maybe then you'll get somewhere.
This is fun. Are you having fun?
I feel like we all could have had some good times... if the human weren't such a human.
Everyone hates you. How does that make you feel?
Thank you so much for coming to visit, human. I want to hear all about you and your kind.
Don't be shy, dear. Tell me about where you live.
When does your kind sleep, human? You do sleep, don't you?
I have to go for now, human...
But I'll repay the visit soon enough.
"Now you don't know what to do
and you don't know what to say.
I cannot believe you hit me. Not appropriate.
You have some pronounced anger issues to work out.
See? I was simply trying to kill you, and you lashed out!
